member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase.GetFormRegions(Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Explorer,System.Type)
member.returns: To access all Microsoft Office Outlook form regions that appear in a specific Explorer, call the FormRegions property of the Globals class and pass in an object that represents the Explorer.For more information, see Accessing a Form Region at Run Time.
